summary: The "Close the Revolving Door Act of 2025" aims to curb lobbying activities by former government officials. Key provisions include a lifetime ban on lobbying by former Members of Congress, a six-year ban on lobbyists becoming congressional staff if they've had substantial contact, and improved reporting requirements. It mandates a joint website for lobbyist disclosures, enhanced penalties for violations, and increased scrutiny of "substantial lobbying entities" to ensure transparent lobbying activities.
